Thankfully you slide into a overturned box of dolls just as it had fallen so when it was picked up no one was the wiser.

Unfortunately for you this box was taken to the boys class next door.

Being a progressive and high tech. school both genders were aloud to take the same classes, though some classes were divided the same materials were covered.

Of course since you were sealed in the box you had no clue that you were changing classes, so you just lay waiting for your opportunity to arrive.
15122.title: No, you're kicked across the floor

151221.content:
As you lay in your box with all the other dolls, the students start to enter the class room. Being an elective course the class size can very from semester to semester, this class had 6 boys in it this term.

They were:

1) Matt Fitzgerald (A.K.A. Fittzy) 6,9
Age 15, Blond hair, blue eyes, USA
He is one of the new stars on the basketball team, good nature and kind but dose have a habit of getting horny quick.

2) Logan Wiand 5,4
Age 17, Dark Brown hair, brown eyes, Canadian
He is a skateboarder who also dose some recreational weed when given the chance. puts on a tough guy act, but is very docile when alone or with a very close friend.

3) Taj Krum 5,9
Age 16, Long Brunet hair, Hazel eyes, Irish
He is a martial artist focusing on kick boxing, spends most of his time training, but dose focus on his studies to keep a good average grade.

4) Vincent Cando 5,6
Age 14, Beach Blond hair, light gray eyes, Mexican/Russian mix
New to the Swim team, he is curious in nature, but has a hard time focusing do to his A.D.H.D.

5) Readers Choice

6) Readers Choice

As the box open you realize you are in the wrong place when you see the face of a middle aged man (the teacher) looking down at you.

You had to think quick you could either speak up now and risk what ever punishment you got, or stick it out to either escape later or hope that who ever you get assigned to has a hot mom/sister that they will pawn you off on.
151221.title: Successively delivered to boys class

1512211.content:
You decide to keep quiet, because you figured that you had another shot if the girls don't find out, and also the boys were more likely to physically harm you.

As you were making your decision the teacher was explaining to the class: "for the next month you will be taking care of these baby dolls, they are the newest models so i don't know all their functions but if their anything like last years they will be warm to the touch with realistic feeling skin, be able to suck on a bottle, and wet them selves, they will also make noises and cry from time to time. any questions?"

Fitzy raises his hand

"Yes Mr. Fitzgerald"

Fitzy Responds "are their any recording devices in them, because my older brother told me there were?"

"No, Due to some legal issues last year only the basic information of care will be collected there is no visual or audible recording. Now any other Questions?"

"Since no one else has any questions you can come up and grab a doll, and try to remember to treat it like a child, though i should mention that the impact sensors have been reduced from the last model due to feedback from past students experiences in school life."

As the students stand and each take a doll you end up with...
1512211.title: Assigned to a boy

15122111.content:
So who is it

Fitzy: blond, horny basketball player

Logan: dark haired, skateboarding pot head, that puts on a tough guy act

Taj: Long haired, Kickboxing, average student

Vincent: Beach blond swimmer with A.D.H.D.
15122111.title: Fitzy, Logan, Taj, Vincent

151221111.content:
As you are taken back to his seat the teacher continues his lesson.

"Now class, the Basic Care of these babies is to nurture, feed, change, and rest them."

"First is Nurture, while we wont be recording any actual conversations the built in software will be able to tell if you are 1)interacting with the baby and 2)if said interaction is said in a positive or negative manor."

Logan asks " So as long as I say it in a nice way I can swear at this thing?"

"Well technically yes but for the benefit of yourself and others try to refrain from that, at least till your home alone."

"Second is Feeding, the school will provide you with 2 weeks of formula, after that you will have to either buy more formula, start it on milk, or water down some baby food and spoon feed it."

Vincent Chimes in "Can't I just Give it water?"

"No this is a baby not a plant the sensors in the doll can tell the thickness of the food, which also means no solid food just like a baby they have the possibility to chock or in this case clog and that would mean the child's and doll's death and an F from me."

"Third is Changes, since these dolls will be eating it makes sense that it will have to come out the other end and as with the formula you will be provided with 2 weeks of diapers, after that you can either buy new ones or choose cloth diapers, we will provide 2 with your weeks of diapers. And just so you know there is a sensor to let us know how long it takes before a change happens so don't think you can leave the same diaper for more than a day and not get marked down."

Taj pipes up "what if i just leave them on the toilet till its done?"

"That's a choice however since some of your dolls are the boy model you have to take that little hose into effect."

As soon as you heard that you felt a little calmed, you didn't have to worry about being discovered when it came time to being changed.

"Also as with a real Child you will be expected to bathe them and that is up to you to take them in the bath with you or bathe them in the sink either way i expect you to use shampoo, soap and water no chemical cleaners it will affect the skin."

With that last statement what calm you had gained was gone. Because you can only guess how these boys will handle washing you.

"Lastly is Rest, now were you chose to bed your doll is your choice. Some have had them in an actual crib, others chose to have them sleep in their bed with them, I even heard one boy put them in their laundry basket. Just be careful not to put the doll through the washing machine!

"As long as it is laying down and in close proximity to someone that can respond to it, because just like new babies you may be woken in the middle of the night for a change or feeding or just because, you will have to figure that out."

With that all the boys had a slightly worried look on their face, for they all new that they needed to sleep in order to function in school and do their other activities.

"With that all being said now we will start the demonstration and practice portion. to begin I will show you how to mix the formula to the right viscosity."

The teacher takes out a pitcher of water a bottle and an empty pitcher and proceeds to mix until it is a little thicker than whole milk then pours it into the bottle before microwaving it to warm.

Fitzy asks "Why are you warming it?"

"For 2 reasons 1) it thins the mix a little and 2) the dolls sucking is started with body heat its one of the few things left from when this was only taught to girls and they breast fed, so no mater the way you chose to feed it, you will have to warm it up first."

Next...
151221111.title: Fitzy

1512211111.content:
"Since we don't have time to have everyone heat their own bottle of formula, I will demonstrate with one of your dolls, and the rest of you can attempt breast feeding to see if any calibrations need to be made."

"Mr. Fitzgerald, may I use yours for the demonstration?"

Fitzy says "of course teacher" as he hands you over.

You felt relief that you wouldn't have to breast feed on a boy, that was until the burning hot bottle was placed on your tongue effectively scorching your mouth leaving you unable to talk, but you forced yourself to drink down the formula as to not blow your cover.

"Now class I want you all to take your own doll and hold it to one of your nipples so we can calibrate any that need it."

As the teacher was saying this he handed you back to your boy saying to him "I don't think you will have a problem with yours, but it's still a good idea to test and see."

To your disdain you were lifted to the boys left nipple. Seeing the torment you just received from the bottle you had no intention on sucking on this boy's tit.

So you decided to...
1512211111.title: Continue Feeding

15122111111.content:
You decide to not participate and just wait it out.

After a few minutes of waiting fitzy becomes annoyed that you aren't sucking like he sees most of the other dolls doing so he first tries pushing your mouth tighter to his tit, but you still wouldn't budge.

Fitzy was about to call the teacher over, when he saw him helping another student so he copied what he saw the teacher doing.

The next thing you know your boy has his hand down the front of your diaper and has grabbed your wiener, out of sheer shock you instinctively inhale, causing Fitzy to think he was on the right track.
However since you only took in the one breath he had to figure out how to make you continually suck, so the next few minutes were torture as he tried turning, rotating, pushing in, and even bending your poor dick. You finally realized this wasn't going to stop until you started sucking, so that's what you did, and the torment stopped, unfortunately he was effectively giving you a hand job when you decided to (in his point of view) work so he assumed that was how to calibrate you.

After making sure all the students dolls were calibrated the teacher
stands back up front and says

"OK class now that we have covered the feeding lets move onto changes, oh but before that if at some point your baby gets fussy you can do the breast feeding like we just did as one of the ways to settle them, but remember you still have to feed them this is not a substitute just a comfort for them. Now onto changings..."
15122111111.title: Refuse

151221111111.content:
"Now as with living beings, your dolls after their feeding and some time will need to get rid of their waste products. According to this models manual these dolls can actually both urinate and defecate with the added post digestion smells. (What will they think up next?) "

Vincent burst out Laughing and giggled "you mean their craps will actually smell like shit?"

"Mr. Cando, please try to watch your language, but yes and so will the urine smell like pee at least that is what it says in this manual you will just have to find out when it happens. Speaking of when, the dolls have a randomizer for when they will GO, so just don't think you can change them the same time every day."

"To start, I will need to barrow someone's doll for the demonstration."

You thank god he chose someone else's doll your mouth was still sore from when he overheated the bottle feeding you.

"OK class watch as i show you how to remove the diaper, clean & powder the area, then put on a new diaper. I will show both the standard and cloth diapers."

"First to remove the standard diaper you pull the tabs on either side of the child, if it is the cloth you remove the safety pin, then you unfold the front, for those of you with male dolls be aware that like with real boys they may chose this point to turn on their hose as it were."

"Next remove the soiled diaper regardless if your doll has only peed or has pooped or both. You will then have to clean them down there. You can either use the wipes provided like this (demonstrates on female doll he borrowed) of coarse those with male dolls will have to wipe the shaft and balls. Or you can take the time and give them a full bathing, just remember to use real soap and shampoo. After drying them it is your choice to powder or not, it has become an issue as of late so we leave it to you."

"Lastly unfold a new standard diaper and place the child like so (once again demonstrating with borrowed doll) fold up the front and apply the adhesive tabs. For the cloth diaper fold into a triangle position the child so the triangle is pointing down, then fold the bottom point over the crotch, and the other points on top of the first and secure with a safety pin. As with a real child try not to stick them with the pin, but seeing as this is the more economical choice for most students we won't be taking off points for a few pokes here and there, just try your best."

"With that, you can pick up your change bags and formula by the door when you leave, now any Questions before class ends?"
151221111111.title: Changing

choices: Try to sneak a peek of his family
1512211111113.content:
Fitzy's house was a Town House in a very nice neighborhood. When walking in the front door to your right was an office/study, left garage entrance and laundry room, strait ahead there was a stair way and just pas that was massive family/living room with 2 couches, 3 recliners and a big screen t.v. on one side of the room was a dining area that led to the kitchen and the other side led to the master suit.

Upstairs had 2 guest rooms and Fitzy's Suit. When entering the room there are 2 long twin beds with a nightstand in between them across the far wall is a long dresser next to witch is a computer desk attached to the room is a good sized bathroom with a shower/tub combo, a 2 sink vanity, a toilet, and a bidet. Next to the Bathroom was a walk in closet with an organizing system that looked as if were never used, there were clothes all over the floor both clean and dirty.

Fitzy entered his house through the garage, he kicked his shoes of into the laundry room, garbed some food from the kitchen, and headed upstairs to his room.

Once in his room he laid you down on one of the beds and walked into his closet to remove all but his boxer briefs. Then headed strait for his laptop, and started playing some games totally ignoring you. Due to how close he was to you your only option was to play your part as a doll, eventually you fell asleep.

It was close to 7 pm according to the bedside clock when his parents finally arrived, they had picked up K.F.C. for diner and called Matt (after hearing everyone at school call him Fitzy, you were surprised that his real name was Matt) down to eat giving you your first time alone since the day started.

“Hey Dan!” Claire says smiling as she stays seated and puts her phone down and adopts a slightly nervous, “And um Maddie won’t be able to make it actually. Alice offered to take her to the toy store instead, but she told me to tell you she said hi!”

“Oh,” you respond, a tinge of sadness in your voice, “Hey I get it! You offer an 8 year old a new toy and they’ll go crazy for it. Now worries I’ll see her next time.”

Claire offers a sad smile before standing, “Come here big bro, give me a hug before we catch up.”

Despite yourself still being a little short for a guy your age you still are able to stand a few inches taller over your sister as you gladly reciprocate and move in for a hug. However, the moment you two touch you feel the familiar feeling from before, almost like a static shock pass between the two of you.

“Oh,” Claire says, no doubt feeling the shock herself, “I guess someone just did laundry.”

“Very funny,” you say giving a small laugh in response to her joke, “Anyways, tell me about how you’ve been.”

Claire smiles before sitting back down. You two order a few drinks and a treat as she tells you about how her schooling is going. She tells you about her classes, how cheerleading is going, and a dozen other things that you happily listen to, honestly just content with spending time with Claire. She also tell you a bit about family life. How Alice treats them like princesses and how Maddie seems to like royalty herself these days.

You roll your eyes, imaging your youngest sister turned into a spoiled brat by your stepmother. The idea makes you shiver.

“Well it sounds like you’ve at least managed to stay humble,” you say as you take a bite from a chocolate croissant, chocolate covering across your face.

“Oh Danny,” Claire says grabbing her napkin, and licking the end of it, “You face is all messy.”

“H-hey sis,” you say pulling away, a little confused with what she was doing, “I appreciate the concern but I can wipe my own face clean.”

“Oh,” Claire says, her eyes going wide as she seems to be brought back to reality and sits back down, “Yeah of course, sorry about that. I don’t know what came over me.”

“It’s fine,” you say grabbing a napkin and wiping your face with a small laugh, “Happy?”

She nods, seemingly back to normal. However, beneath the surface, Claire is feeling the curse the witch put on you slowly take its hold on you as the longer you two sit at the table together, the more she’s started to see you as something to be taken care of, something to cherish, and something to baby.

“Well,” you say sitting back in your chair and looking at the time, “I better get home. I’ve got a bit of a walk back to my place and it’s already getting dark.”

“Oh?” Claire says trying to think of any reason to keep you here, “Do we have to? I mean I haven’t even heard you talk about how work is going?”

“Maybe next time,” you say standing up, “I’d love to talk more but the cafe is closing to so we’d better go.”

“Then come back to the house,” Claire says sounding oddly desperate, “Um that way we can keep talking and maybe you can see Maddie? I’m sure Alice would be fine with it if I want you there.”

You think about it for a moment, staring down as Maddie is still seated. Something feels off about his whole thing but you can’t quite put your finger on it. However, you’re not about to turn down the opportunity to see your sisters.

“Okay sounds good let’s get walking,” you say.

“No need!” Maddie says standing up and holding up a set of BMW keys, “I forgot to mention I got my license too!”

However, as she stands you can’t help but not only admire the expensive keys in her hand. However as she flaunts her new car keys you suddenly notice you are having to look up every so slightly at her. Before you can question it further Claire takes your hand and practically drags you out of the cafe. The moment your hands touch you feel the sensation again only this time Claire’s hand tightens on yours, the feeling bringing a smile to her lips.

You decide to chalk up the size difference to a trick of lighting or not noticing she was standing on something as she drags you out and escorts you to her bright white car. She opens the door for you and you two take off towards her house, and your old childhood home,

When you get there…

155331.content:
You pushed through the crowd of people as the hospital vehicles started to arrive. They were bringing in several babies for some of the girls dorms to take care of. Everybody wanted to see them, but at your short stature, it was a struggle.

You managed to reach the front of the crowd, only to realize you were too short to see the babies anyways, since they were going to be placed in strollers or carried.

Nobody knew exactly how many babies were being brought, because the school had agreed they'd take as many as the hospital had need for them to take.

As the first baby was rolled out in a stroller, the crowd pressed in. You were pushed forward by shuffling feet, and decided that you would move to the other side, where there was a ledge you could climb up upon. There wasn't a crowd on this side,to give an ample path for the hospital and vehicles, so you were alone.

With so many people cranking to look at the cute little things, one of the children got overwhelmed and started to wail. Because of this, the hospital staff asked everyone to move back, and so people started to back away, and slowly started leaving as the astonishment at the children faded.

You however, still hadn't gotten a good look at them, so you stayed on your side and started to climb the ledge. As you did, however, you slipped and fell, hitting your head upon the ground and biting your tongue hard in the process. You stood up shakily, and stumbled a few steps without knowing where you were going.

When your vision cleared, you found yourself at the open doors of one of the hospital vehicles. You still felt a little dizzy, so you decided to sit down for a minute there until you felt a little better.

One of the hospital staff, a young lady with a bosom practically bursting out of her uniform, came over to the vehicle, in order to unload equipment and bring the children. She looked down and noticed you with a start and a smile.

"Why hello there," She said, beaming down at you, "Now how did you get out of the car, little guy?"

It took you a second to realize what she was saying, and by the time you comprehended it, the lady had bent down and scooped you up, placing you on her hip. She began to take you inside with the rest of the children and baby equipment.

"Newh, Ih nawe bejby!" You said, your swollen tongue making it sound like a random jumble of sounds.

"Aww, how cute!" The lady said,taking you inside.

There, you were set in a playpen with several other babies. You tried to climb the walls of the pen, but were quickly pushed gently but firmly back by the hospital lady.

A group of dorm mothers, most of whom you recognized, entered the room. The last of the baby equipment was brought in, and a couple more young babies were placed in the pen with you. You watched with horror as one of the hospital staff gave a brief lesson on the basics of how to take care of babies.

Then the playpen was opened. You tried to run out, but were instantly scooped up by one of the hospital staff, as the other children were also picked up. You were placed in a stroller, which was packed with baby supplies, from diapers to wipes to little onesies.

Only then did you get to see the dorm mother who you were given to. You hoped that they would recognize you, as most of them at least knew who you were, but to your chagrin, you looked up to the beaming face of the newest dorm mother, Ms Clarke, who had no idea who you were.
